mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (btitle, bcontent, bwriter) values(#{btitle},#{bcontent},#{bwriter})
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0
